items.question: What types of lens distortions can be corrected?
items.answer: Our AI lens correction tool can efficiently correct barrel distortion, pincushion distortion, and vignetting issues, ensuring your images look accurate and professional.

items.question: How quickly can I apply corrections to my images?
items.answer: Image corrections are processed in seconds. The AI automatically analyzes the image and applies adjustments almost instantly, allowing for rapid workflows.

items.question: Do I need any photo editing experience to use this feature?
items.answer: No, our platform is designed to be user-friendly. Even if you have no editing experience, you can easily upload your images and apply corrections with just a few clicks.

items.question: Can I batch process multiple images at once?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can upload and correct multiple images simultaneously, saving time and ensuring consistency across your visuals.

items.question: Is there a preview option available before downloading?
items.answer: Yes, you can preview your corrected images to ensure they meet your expectations before downloading them.

items.question: What image formats are supported for uploading?
items.answer: We support JPG, PNG, and TIFF formats, ensuring flexibility for your photography needs.

items.question: Will I own the commercial rights to corrected images?
items.answer: Yes, every image processed through our service grants you full commercial rights, allowing you to use them across any media platform without additional fees.

items.question: What support is available if I encounter issues?
items.answer: Our support team is readily available through email and live chat, plus we offer extensive documentation and tutorials for troubleshooting and best practices.

items.question: How is pricing structured for the correction services?
items.answer: We operate with a pay-as-you-go model with no subscriptions. You pay only for the corrections you apply, allowing for budget-friendly solutions.

items.question: Can this feature assist with e-commerce product listings?
items.answer: Yes, perfecting images for e-commerce is one of our key applications. Clear, corrected images significantly enhance product appeal and boost sales.
